Package index

Themes

Complete ggplot2 themes with Catppuccin styling

theme_catppuccin()
Catppuccin Theme for ggplot2
theme_catppuccin_minimal()
Minimal Catppuccin Theme for ggplot2
theme_catppuccin_void()
Void Catppuccin Theme for ggplot2

Discrete Color Scales

Discrete color and fill scales

scale_color_catppuccin() scale_fill_catppuccin() scale_color_catppuccin_d() scale_fill_catppuccin_d()
Catppuccin Color Scales

Continuous Color Scales

Continuous color and fill scales

scale_color_catppuccin_c() scale_fill_catppuccin_c()
Catppuccin Continuous Color Scales
scale_color_catppuccin_sequential() scale_fill_catppuccin_sequential()
Catppuccin Sequential Color Scales
scale_color_catppuccin_diverging() scale_fill_catppuccin_diverging()
Catppuccin Diverging Color Scales

Helper Geoms

Convenience geoms with built-in Catppuccin colors

geom_catppuccin_point() geom_catppuccin_col() geom_catppuccin_line() geom_catppuccin_bar() geom_catppuccin_boxplot() geom_catppuccin_violin()
Catppuccin Geom Helpers

Palettes and Utilities

Access palettes and color utilities

catppuccin_flavors
Catppuccin Color Palettes
catppuccin_palette()
Extract Catppuccin Palette Colors
show_catppuccin_palette()
Show Catppuccin Palette Colors
compare_flavors()
Compare Catppuccin Flavors
set_catppuccin_flavor()
Set Global Catppuccin Flavor

R Markdown Integration

CSS generation for documents

catppuccin_css() write_catppuccin_css()
Catppuccin CSS for R Markdown and Quarto
